name: Farm Bubble Happy Land 2
description:
Farm Bubble Happy Land 2 is getting funnier and funnier with farm bubble shooter
continuously, adds more amusing and interesting levels to this addictive and relaxing bubble shooter game.Use power-ups like color ball and fire ball to pop bubbles. When you use all the moves and need more, there is +5 ball power-up that gives you the 5 extra moves to continue blast bubbles .
Features:
- Easy to play
- It is suitable for everyone, and play it at any time.
- Several different scenes e.g., farm, cornfield , mountain, and etc.
- Up to 600 levels
- Various kinds of obstacles
